price: (Ànábì Mūsā) sọ pé: “Olúwa mi, dájúdájú èmi pa ẹnì kan nínú wọn. Nítorí náà, mò ń bẹ̀rù pé wọ́n máa pa mí.
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّي قَتَلۡتُ مِنۡهُمۡ نَفۡسٗا فَأَخَافُ أَن يَقۡتُلُونِ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi innī qataltu min'hum nafsan fa-akhāfu an yaqtulūni
